name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set2SMS Send & Receve SMS from chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension let you send and recive sms from google chrome using your android phone + Set2SMS APP

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect Mobile phones using set2sms app connected to your network, and start sending sms on your browser
